title: Residence领地插件空手右键容器提示（此处禁止使用该物品）
author: kioging
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kioging 于 2020-6-28 20:04 编辑 

Residence服务器领地插件，用空手右键容器提示“此处禁止使用该物品.”怎么解决（然而拿着物品右键容器可以正常使用）
问题图：




image.png (236.9 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-6-28 20:03 上传







语言设置项：





image.png (5.85 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-6-28 20:03 上传





折腾了老久了，求大佬解答，谢谢！

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wjwrh 于 2020-6-28 20:15 编辑 

打开
residence\flags.yml
找到最后一行Items
把里面的东西都删掉
留一个- BEDROCK就行了
就是改成这样
ItemList:
  # list name is not important, as long as it is unique. Its good to use a descripive name.
  DefaultList:
    # type of the list, can be blacklist, whitelist, or ignorelist
    Type: blacklist
    # If you want, you can have this list only apply to one world, otherwise it applies to all worlds
    # World: world
    # You can also have the list apply only to one group, otherwise it applies for all groups
    # Group: default
    # this is the actual list of material names that this list allows or disallows
    # You can look up the material name by item ID in game by typing /res material <id>
    # Alternativly, you can simply use the item ID in the list, but its less descriptive and harder to see what the list allows or dissallows at a glance
    Items:
    - BEDROCK复制代码

replies.author: kioging
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 kioging 于 2020-6-28 20:12 编辑 
梓 发表于 2020-6-28 20:07
空手
/BanItem del
求具体解决方法，服务器只有安装一个领地插件，没有BanItem插件

replies.author: kioging
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-6-28 20:14
打开
residence\flags.yml
找到最后一行Items
谢谢大佬，问题解决了
